theDuelist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theDuelist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theDuelist:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theDuelist:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theDuelist:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theDuelist:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to ALL enemies, 2 times.
theDuelist:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to ALL enemies, 3 times.

theDuelist:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theDuelist:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theDuelist:AxeDespair.NAME: Axe of Despair
theDuelist:AxeDespair.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 strength this turn. At the end of the turn, Sacrifice 1 and place this card on top of your draw pile.

theDuelist:BadReaction.NAME: Bad Reaction to Simochi
theDuelist:BadReaction.DESCRIPTION: During your turn, any healing effects damage all enemies instead.

theDuelist:BarrelDragon.NAME: Barrel Dragon
theDuelist:BarrelDragon.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Deal 10 damage. Apply 3 random debuffs to 3 random enemies.

theDuelist:BlueEyes.NAME: B.E. White Dragon
theDuelist:BlueEyes.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Deal 30 damage. If you play 3 copies of this in one turn, add a copy of Blue Eyes Ultimate to your hand.

theDuelist:BusterBlader.NAME: Buster Blader
theDuelist:BusterBlader.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Deal 25 damage. Add 5 damage for each enemy in combat.

theDuelist:CannonSoldier.NAME: Cannon Soldier
theDuelist:CannonSoldier.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, remove 1 summon and deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:CardDestruction.NAME: Card Destruction
theDuelist:CardDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Discard your entire hand. Gain 1 Intangible. Gain 1 block for each enemy in combat. Gain 1 artifact for each enemy in combat.

theDuelist:CatapultTurtle.NAME: Catapult Turtle
theDuelist:CatapultTurtle.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, remove all summons and deal 10 damage for each to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:DarkHole.NAME: Dark Hole
theDuelist:DarkHole.DESCRIPTION: Destroy ALL minions in combat. Remove all your buffs. Exhaust.

theDuelist:DarklordMarie.NAME: Darklord Marie
theDuelist:DarklordMarie.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 monster. Deal 4 damage. Overflow 10 - gain 2 HP.

theDuelist:DarkMagician.NAME: Dark Magician
theDuelist:DarkMagician.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2.  Deal 25 damage. Apply 3 Spell Counters.

theDuelist:ExodiaHead.NAME: Exodia Head
theDuelist:ExodiaHead.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ExodiaLA.NAME: Exodia Left Arm
theDuelist:ExodiaLA.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ExodiaLL.NAME: Exodia Left Leg
theDuelist:ExodiaLL.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ExodiaRA.NAME: Exodia Right Arm
theDuelist:ExodiaRA.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ExodiaRL.NAME: Exodia Right Leg
theDuelist:ExodiaRL.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ImperialOrder.NAME: Imperial Order
theDuelist:ImperialOrder.DESCRIPTION: Negate all enemy buffs and debuffs. At the start of each turn, choose to take 7 damage or remove this effect.

theDuelist:JamBreeding.NAME: Jam Breeding Machine
theDuelist:JamBreeding.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Summon 1 and deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

theDuelist:Mausoleum.NAME: Mausoleum of the Emperor
theDuelist:Mausoleum.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play with Tribute each turn does not sacrifice. Take 1 damage each turn.

theDuelist:MonsterReborn.NAME: Monster Reborn
theDuelist:MonsterReborn.DESCRIPTION: Play a monster card from your discard pile. Exhaust.

theDuelist:NutrientZ.NAME: Nutrient Z
theDuelist:NutrientZ.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy attacks you for 20+ damage, heal for 40 HP before taking damage.

theDuelist:ObeliskTormentor.NAME: Obelisk
theDuelist:ObeliskTormentor.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 4. Each time you sacrifice a monster, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:OjamaBlack.NAME: Ojama Black
theDuelist:OjamaBlack.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Apply 10 Spell Counter. Gain Black Ojama Token

theDuelist:Ojamagic.NAME: Ojamagic
theDuelist:Ojamagic.DESCRIPTION: Apply a random number (0-10) of Spell Counters to each enemy. Exhaust.

theDuelist:OjamaGreen.NAME: Ojama Green
theDuelist:OjamaGreen.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Apply 5 Spell Counter. Gain Green Ojama Token.

theDuelist:OjamaKnight.NAME: Ojama Knight
theDuelist:OjamaKnight.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 1. Gain a random Ojama Token.

theDuelist:OjamaYellow.NAME: Ojama Yellow
theDuelist:OjamaYellow.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Apply 1 Spell Counter. Gain Yellow Ojama Token

theDuelist:PotAvarice.NAME: Pot of Avarice
theDuelist:PotAvarice.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 monster cards from your discard pile into your deck. Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.

theDuelist:RainMercy.NAME: Rain of Mercy
theDuelist:RainMercy.DESCRIPTION: Heal 15 HP and heal ALL enemies for 20 HP.

theDuelist:SwordsRevealing.NAME: Swords of Revealing Light
theDuelist:SwordsRevealing.DESCRIPTION: For the next 3 turns, gain 1 Intangible. You may not play any attack cards while this effect is active.

theDuelist:TimeWizard.NAME: Time Wizard
theDuelist:TimeWizard.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, either ALL enemies receive 1 Spell Counter or you receive 1 vulnerable. Chosen randomly.

theDuelist:TrapHole.NAME: Trap Hole
theDuelist:TrapHole.DESCRIPTION: The next time an enemy summons minions, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:WingedDragonRa.NAME: Winged Dragon of Ra
theDuelist:WingedDragonRa.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 4. Deal damage equal to (number of cards played this turn + summons) multiplied by X.
